product_name: Thule Round Trip Pro Bike Case
long_description: The Thule Round Trip Pro Bike Case protects your bike during transport with a clever, collapsible soft-shell design. It features an integrated bike stand for smooth reassembly when you arrive.
short_description: The Thule Round Trip Pro Bike Case protects your bike during transport with a clever, collapsible soft-shell design. It features an integrated bike stand for smooth reassembly when you arrive.
